transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Pooja mam se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan Pooja mam very good evening main Richa Agarwal baat kar rahi hu India Mart se Noida head office se baat kar rahi hu main senior manager.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Mam bataiye wo Imran se aapki shayad baat ho rahi thi main Imran ki manager hi baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Toh
Executive: Kuch renewal amount ko leke issue aa raha tha app mein aur gateway mein toh aap mujhe bataiye aap ye keh rahe hain ki waha pe kyun 28000 ka GST nahi show kar raha hai.
Customer: Exactly.
Executive: Right? Toh main bata deti hu mam aap na corporate.indiamart.com agar khol ke dekhenge ye bhi India Mart ka ek site hai.
Waha pe hamare actual price likhe hote hain right? Jab hum kisi customer se baat karte hain ya hamara koi vintage customer hota hai usko hum discount kara ke dete hain because new customer ke liye price toh MRP hi hoga na but for the existing customer hum unhe hamesha discount offer karte hain toh agar main discounted price agar aap keh rahe ho ki discounted price app pe dikhao toh waha pe toh wo applicable nahi hoga na new customer ke liye kyunki app toh sabke liye hai mam aur waha pe main discount karke dikha dungi toh fir toh sare customer unse discount avail karne lagenge na mam. So that is the reason main waha pe discount nahi dikha sakti.
Hmm.
Executive: Toh aap mujhe bataiye mam isme kya issue aa raha hai aapne last time jo UPI kiya tha.
Customer: Issue ye aa raha hai unhone jo mujhe mail kiya mujhe UPI karne mein problem nahi hai problem hai agar mera app se direct problem payment ho raha ho toh mujhe koi doubt nahi tha theek hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Lekin jo unhone mujhe proposal bheja hai usme bhi login ka option aa raha hai directly.
Executive: Proposal mein kya aa raha hai?
Customer: Jaise main view proposal kar rahi hu toh waha pe seedha
Executive: Mam aapka na voice beech beech mein break ho raha hai Pooja mam shayad kuch network issue hai kya aapke end pe voice break ho ja raha hai aapka beech beech mein.
Customer: I don't know mera network toh full hai.
Customer: Main ye bol rahi hu jaise unhone mujhe proposal bheja hai us proposal mein bhi jaise main view proposal kar rahi hu toh seedha mere paas login maang raha hai.
Executive: Kya maang raha hai?
Customer: India Mart India Mart ka seedha login maang raha hai sign in karne ke liye dikha raha hai.
Executive: Mam aapne last time bhi aise hi kiya tha agar aapko yaad hoga jab aapne UPI ke through payment kiya tha last time hume 28000 plus GST tabhi bhi aapne aise hi payment kiya tha aapne aise hi proposal approve kiya tha aur usi ke through aapne gateway ke through payment kiya tha.
Customer: Main aise nahi kiya tha mere paas wo jo person the meeting ke liye aaye the unke samne hi maine payment kiya tha.
Executive: Toh proposal toh aapne approve kiya tha na mam ki aapne deal kari hai.
Customer: Proposal kiya us time mera mind mein nahi hai tha ki matlab kya view proposal karke kiya tha maine kaise kiya tha I don't know mujhe yaad nahi hai wo.
Executive: Mam isme aapko kya issue aa raha hai like aapko koi security concern aa rahe hain.
Customer: Exactly mere ko yahi hai security ka hi mujhe doubt aa raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Mam aap na India Mart aap keh rahe ho ki wo proposal pe jo view proposal aa raha hai wo aap click nahi karoge aap ye keh rahe ho.
Customer: Haan mujhe waha pe seedha login ka option dikha raha hai waha OTP ka option dikha raha hai toh mujhe wo mind mein doubt aa raha hai aur abhi mere paas na itna sara calls aa raha hai na ki main abhi abhi main ekdam mera mind set hil gaya hai theek hai toh main aapko clearly bol rahi hu main aapse kal baat karungi main abhi aap mujhe please call mat kariye.
Customer: Kyunki mera call waiting mein bhi do teen calls aa rahe hain client se mere bar bar call aa rahe hain mera toh mera mind waha pe bhi divert ho raha hai main aapse kal free hoke baat karti hu.
Executive: Main bhi aapka ticket close kar du aapne jo concern raise kiya hai wo main band kar du aapke.
Customer: Haan close close kar dijiye koi problem nahi hai lekin main kal baat karungi bas.
Executive: Theek hai fir kal kar lete hain.
Customer: Hmm okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is concerned about security of payment.

- Login option appearing in proposal.

- GST amount not showing in the app.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the pricing policy.

- Executive offered to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral | Risk of churn -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- proposal, payment, security, login, gst
